DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate visual outcome , amount inflammation , endothelial cell loss , efficiency torsional handpiece compare conventional handpiece surgery remove cataract .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Torsional Handpiece Conventional Handpiece During Routine Phacoemulsification
DOC.detailed_description: With introduction new phaco-emulsification system , cataract surgery become safe procedure . The new machine combine few surge , low amount ultrasound control anterior chamber depth , well low incidence thermal burn incision site.1-4 Alcon 's Infiniti Vision System phacoemulsification machine include torsional handpiece ( OZiL™ ) . The goal OZiL™ minimize surgery impact reduce temperature increase , turbulence incision stress . This handpiece sideways movement repel cataract extraction make removal continuous , maintain occlusion facilitates vacuum build-up reduces flow anterior chamber decrease turbulence , therefore reduce likelihood lens particle damage corneal endothelial cell . The purpose study compare visual outcome , induction inflammation , endothelial cell loss efficiency torsional handpiece vs. conventional phacoemulsification handpiece use Alcon Infiniti Vision System .
DOC.criteria: Bilateral senile cataract . Cataract density 3+ . 50 year age old . Patient must desire cataract extraction . Expected maximum 4 week minimum 1 week interval first second eye surgery . Willing able comply schedule visit study procedure . Preoperative ocular pathology : amblyopia , rubella cataract , proliferative diabetic retinopathy , macular edema , retinal detachment , uveitis , history iritis , iris neovascularization , medically uncontrolled glaucoma , microphthalmus macrophthalmus , optic nerve atrophy , macular degeneration visual acuity less 20/40 , glaucoma presence visual field defect Corneal irregularity potentially affect visual acuity : keratoconus , corneal dystrophy , corneal opacity . Low endothelial cell count ( less 1500 cells/mm2 ) Any concurrent infectious/non infectious conjunctivitis , keratitis uveitis either eye . Any clinically significant , serious severe medical psychiatric condition . Participation ( current participation ) investigational drug device trial within previous 30 day prior start date trial . Previous intraocular corneal surgery . Other ocular surgery time cataract extraction .
